explains: n. 乙烯基（化学）；黑胶唱片
wordGroup: vinyl chloride 氯乙烯；氯化乙烯
vinyl ester 乙烯基酯；乙烯酯

sentences.en: It's a vinyl doll with movable arms and legs.
sentences.cn: 这是个胳膊和腿都能活动的乙烯基塑料娃娃。

sentences.en: This compilation was first issued on vinyl in 1984.
sentences.cn: 这一辑于1984年首次以乙烯基塑料唱片形式发行。

sentences.en: The brown vinyl covering all the horizontal surfaces is coming unstuck in several places.
sentences.cn: 所有横面上盖的棕色乙烯基塑料有些地方开始脱落了。
